column2: An HTTP request handler that performs expensive operations without restricting the rate at which operations can be carried out is vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.
column4:
This route handler performs [["a file system access"|"relative:///index.js:23:5:23:46"]], but is not rate-limited.
